text: Step 1: Determine a pivot nn n left pivot right Step 2: Shift the left pointer to find nn n a value greater than the pivot left pivot right Step 3: Shift the right pointer to n nn find a value less than the pivot left pivot right swap L Step 4: Swap values at the poiners left pivot right Step 5: Repeat the above steps until n nn two pointers both meet or cross left pivot right
